mapper.sql: logit.id as logit_id, logit.access_ip as logit_access_ip, logit.api_name as logit_api_name, logit.country as logit_country, logit.province as logit_province, logit.city as logit_city, logit.district as logit_district, logit.create_time as logit_create_time, logit.description as logit_description, logit.type as logit_type, logit.exception_class as logit_exception_class
mapper.select:
select * from t_logit
AND type = ${type}
AND (api_name~'${keyword}' OR access_api~'${keyword}' OR description~'${keyword}')
order by ${orderName} desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_logit (id, access_ip, api_name, country, province, city, district, create_time, description, type, exception_class) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accessIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exceptionClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_logit
access_ip = #{accessIp,jdbcType=CHAR},
api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

exception_class = #{exceptionClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
